THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION suddenly yesterday after a long day of travel and sitting for extended periods.
(Act as if feeling anxious but trying to stay calm, speaking in a worried but clear tone)

Yesterday, I saw a dark spot on my thigh that looks like skin is dying, and today I started feeling short of breath and a sharp pain in my chest when I breathe deeply. I’ve had a family history of blood clots, and I’ve always been told I might be at risk because of my relatives. I’m really worried it might be something serious like a blood clot or a pulmonary embolism."

I also feel kind of really tired and bloated, and I’m worried it might be something serious like a blood clot or a pulmonary embolism, especially since my family has a history of blood clots.
